title: For Sale T206 and T202 cards***Cobb PSA 4
author: Brass23

posts.post_title: For Sale T206 and T202 cards***Cobb PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone. I saw alot of these posts when I started coming on this forum and never thought I'd be here but I am selling off most of my collection of T206 cards and newspaper ads to pay down my honeymoon. Its sad but a reality.
So I can be reached at [url]kilaartist@aol.com[/url]. My name is Doug. This will be the first of a few posts. I'm hoping to sell to you guys rather then go on eBay but if you want to check me out I'm Brass2384 on eBay w. 100% rating. I will accept paypal for items.
Prices are negotiable
Here is what I have to offer:
T206 Graded

Ray Demmitt New York VG-EX4 PSA Piedmont 350 back $55.00
Phil Poland EX 5 PSA Piedmont 350 back (ghost image) $85.00
Ty Cobb Bat Off Shoulder VG-EX4 PSA Piedmont 350 back $1620.00

regular

Graham, St. Louis Amer. Piedmont 350 back $25.00
Knight, N.Y. Amer. Piedmont 350 back $16.00

T202 Triple Folders graded and ungraded

F. Chance/J. Evers "Evers makes a safe slide" EX 5 PSA $245.00
Wm. Dahlen/ W. Scanlan "Hartzell Covering Third" ungraded $55.00
O.Crandell/J. Meyers "Just before the Battle" ungraded $45.00

I am scanning all of the images after I post this thread. Thank you.
